content.bannerNote: Your ufirst Private account offers Worldwide Travel Insurance. In order for you and your family to be covered for this benefit you will need to register directly with the insurance provider. Select the Explore button below to find out more information on how you can register.

content.heading: Enjoy the full range of banking, lifestyle and protection benefits
content.content: With a ufirst Private account from Ulster Bank you can enjoy an interest free overdraft of up to €1000, 25% cash back on up to 4 tickets for events, travel discounts, and lots more. The ufirst Private account also has additional insurance and protection benefits at no extra cost. Customers will also pay a €36 per month fee for the Private Relationship service provided to customers of Ulster Bank Private charged via their ufirst Private Current Account.

benefit.title: Annual Worldwide Family Travel Insurance
benefit.content: Enjoy worldwide travel with annual cover for trips up to 31 days. This also includes up to 17 days winter sports cover.

benefit.title: Travel Service
benefit.content: 10% discount off weekend breaks, hotels, holidays, car hire and overseas travel.

benefit.title: Ticket Booking
benefit.content: Enjoy 25% cash back off event tickets throughout the Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland and the rest of the UK.

benefit.title: Interest free arranged overdraft
benefit.content: You can apply for an interest free overdraft of up to €1,000 __(0% variable)__.

benefit.title: Preferential arranged overdraft rate
benefit.content: You can apply for a higher arranged overdraft limit above the interest-free arranged overdraft limit.

benefit.title: Tailored rates on savings
benefit.content: Easy access savings account, making it easy to save and easy to manage your savings.

benefit.title: Tailored rates on personal mortgages
benefit.content: Apply for an Ulster Bank mortgage and you can enjoy tailored variable mortgage rates.

benefit.title: Tailored rates on personal loans
benefit.content: You can enjoy a 1% discount on our standard fixed rates when you apply for an Ulster Bank loan.

benefit.title: Interest when your account is in credit
benefit.content: Whether you have €1 or €10,000 in your ufirst Private account, credit interest will be added to your account every month.

benefit.title: Commission Free Travel Money
benefit.content: You will not pay any commission when you order your travel money at any Ulster Bank branch.

benefit.title: Airport Lounge Access
benefit.content: You can apply to gain access to over 700 airport lounges around the world for a small fee.

benefit.title: Car Insurance discount
benefit.content: You are eligible for a 10% discount off your first year’s Ulster Bank Car Insurance discount premium.

benefitBlocks.heading: Manage your sign in details
benefitBlocks.blockText: This is where you can change your personal details or password.

benefitBlocks.heading: View your past interactions with your benefits
